ar.com.hjg.pngj
Class PngHelper

java.lang.Object
  ar.com.hjg.pngj.PngHelper

public class PngHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Some utility static methods.

See also FileHelper (if not sandboxed).

Client code should rarely need these methods.
